verses.verse: Now <S%H5283>Naaman,<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria,<s%> was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H113>master,<s%> and <S%H5375>honorable,<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> by him the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H8668>deliverance<s%> to <S%H758>Syria:<s%> he was also a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in <S%H2428>valor,<s%> but he was a <S%H6879>leper.<s%>

And the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> had <S%H3318>gone<s%> out by <S%H1416>companies,<s%> and had <S%H7617>brought<s%> away <S%H7617>captive<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5291>maid;<s%> and she <S%H1961>waited<s%> <S%H6440><s%> on <S%H5283>Naaman's<s%> <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H1404>mistress,<s%> <S%H305>Would<s%> God my <S%H113>lord<s%> were with the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> that is in <S%H8111>Samaria!<s%> for he would <S%H622>recover<s%> him of his <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%>

And one <S%H935>went<s%> in, and <S%H5046>told<s%> his <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2063>Thus<s%> and <S%H2063>thus<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> the <S%H5291>maid<s%> that is of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>Go<s%> to, <S%H935>go,<s%> and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H5612>letter<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> And he <S%H3212>departed,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> with him <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> pieces of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H899>raiment.<s%>

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H5612>letter<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> when <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>letter<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> to you, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have therewith <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> to you, that you may <S%H622>recover<s%> him of his <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H7121>read<s%> the <S%H5612>letter,<s%> that he <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Am I <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> and to make <S%H2421>alive,<s%> that <S%H2088>this<s%> man does <S%H7971>send<s%> to me to <S%H622>recover<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of his <S%H6883>leprosy?<s%> <S%H3588>why<s%> <S%H389><s%> <S%H3045>consider,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3588>how<s%> he <S%H579>seeks<s%> a <S%H579>quarrel<s%> against me.

And it was so, when <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> that he <S%H7971>sent<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> have you <S%H7167>rent<s%> your <S%H899>clothes?<s%> let him <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> to me, and he shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that there is a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

So <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with his <S%H5483>horses<s%> and with his <S%H7393>chariot,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H477>Elisha.<s%>

And <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> to him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H7364>wash<s%> in <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to you, and you shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

But <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> was <S%H7107>wroth,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> away, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I <S%H559>thought,<s%> He will surely <S%H3318>come<s%> out to me, and <S%H5975>stand,<s%> and <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5130>strike<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> the <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H622>recover<s%> the <S%H6879>leper.<s%>

Are not <S%H71>Abana<s%> and <S%H6554>Pharpar,<s%> <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> may I not <S%H7364>wash<s%> in them, and be <S%H2891>clean?<s%> So he <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> away in a <S%H2534>rage.<s%>

And his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H1>father,<s%> if the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> had <S%H1696>bid<s%> you do some <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> would you not have <S%H6213>done<s%> it? <S%H637>how<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> <S%H3588><s%> rather then, <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> to you, <S%H7364>Wash,<s%> and be <S%H2891>clean?<s%>

Then <S%H3381>went<s%> he <S%H3381>down,<s%> and <S%H2881>dipped<s%> himself <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>saying<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%> and his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H7725>came<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> like to the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of a <S%H6995>little<s%> <S%H5288>child,<s%> and he was <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

And he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> he and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4264>company,<s%> and <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him: and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> but in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant.<s%>

But he <S%H559>said,<s%> As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H5975>stand,<s%> I will <S%H3947>receive<s%> none. And he <S%H6484>urged<s%> him to <S%H3947>take<s%> it; but he <S%H3985>refused.<s%>

And <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Shall there not then, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, be <S%H5414>given<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant<s%> two <S%H6505>mules'<s%> <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H127>earth?<s%> for your <S%H5650>servant<s%> will from now <S%H5750>on<s%> <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering nor <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> but to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

In <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5545>pardon<s%> your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> that when my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H935>goes<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and he <S%H8172>leans<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and I <S%H7812>bow<s%> myself in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7417>Rimmon:<s%> when I <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> myself in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7417>Rimmon,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5545>pardon<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3212>Go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%> So he <S%H3212>departed<s%> from him a <S%H3530>little<s%> <S%H776>way.<s%>

But <S%H1522>Gehazi,<s%> the <S%H5288>servant<s%> of <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> my <S%H113>master<s%> has <S%H2820>spared<s%> <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H761>Syrian,<s%> in not <S%H3947>receiving<s%> at his <S%H3027>hands<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H935>brought:<s%> but, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> I will <S%H7323>run<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3972>somewhat<s%> of him.

So <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> <S%H7291>followed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5283>Naaman.<s%> And when <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> him <S%H7323>running<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, he <S%H5307>lighted<s%> down from the <S%H4818>chariot<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> Is all <S%H7965>well?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> All is <S%H7965>well.<s%> My <S%H113>master<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> even <S%H6258>now<s%> there be <S%H935>come<s%> to me from <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5288>young<s%> men of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets:<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> them, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H899>garments.<s%>

And <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Be <S%H2974>content,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> two <S%H3603>talents.<s%> And he <S%H6555>urged<s%> him, and <S%H6887>bound<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> in <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2754>bags,<s%> with <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H5414>laid<s%> them on <S%H8147>two<s%> of his <S%H5288>servants;<s%> and they <S%H5375>bore<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And when he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H6076>tower,<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> them from their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H6485>bestowed<s%> them in the <S%H1004>house:<s%> and he let the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> and they <S%H3212>departed.<s%>

But he <S%H935>went<s%> in, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> his <S%H113>master.<s%> And <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, From <S%H370>where<s%> come you, <S%H1522>Gehazi?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H575>where.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H1980>Went<s%> not my <S%H3820>heart<s%> with you, <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> again from his <S%H4818>chariot<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> you? Is it a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H3701>money,<s%> and to <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> and olive <S%H2132>groves,<s%> and <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H5650>menservants,<s%> and <S%H8198>maidservants?<s%>

The <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> therefore of <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> shall <S%H1692>stick<s%> to you, and to your <S%H2233>seed<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%> And he <S%H3318>went<s%> out from his <S%H6440>presence<s%> a <S%H6879>leper<s%> as white as <S%H7950>snow.<s%>
